com.safenetinc.luna.exception

Class LunaException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • java.security.ProviderException
            • com.safenetinc.luna.exception.LunaException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LunaBIP32KeypairDerivationException, LunaKeyLimitException, LunaMechanismInvalidException, LunaNotSupportedException, LunaObjectNotFoundException, LunaPartitionFullException, LunaPkcs11AttributesConfigException

    public class LunaException
extends java.security.ProviderException
    Thrown by the Luna security provider when it encounters an internal error. More information can be found in the detail message and/or in the cause.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructs a LunaException with the specified detail message and cause.

      Constructs a LunaException with the specified cause.
